column4: i dont know how to search this, but im sure its possible. How do i copy my current LInux user and such, and install it to a bootable flash drive. So - basically when i use one of those startup flash drives, instead of a default user, i have my user.
back-up your home directory and create a user on the new box with the same UID.
(or know how to chown it to the new user)
not exactly what i was thinking of. I dont really care about he user name. but more of the options. installed packages and such.
